Member Function Documentation

GLboolean tinyShaders::shaderProgram_t::Compile ( void  )
inline
751  {
752  handle = glCreateProgram();
753  GLchar errorLog[512];
754  GLint successful = GL_FALSE;
755  if ( !compiled )
756  {
757  for ( GLuint iterator = 0; iterator <shaders.size(); iterator++ )
758  {
759  if ( shaders[iterator] != nullptr )
760  {
761  glAttachShader( handle, shaders[iterator]->handle );
762  }
763  }
764 
765  // specify vertex input attributes
766  for ( GLuint i = 0; i <inputs.size(); ++i )
767  {
768  glBindAttribLocation( handle, i, inputs[i] );
769  }
770 
771  // specify pixel shader outputs
772  for ( GLuint i = 0; i <outputs.size(); ++i )
773  {
774  glBindFragDataLocation( handle, i, outputs[i] );
775  }
776 
777  glLinkProgram( handle );
778  glGetProgramiv( handle, GL_LINK_STATUS, &successful );
779  glGetProgramInfoLog( handle, sizeof( errorLog ), 0, errorLog );
780 
781  if ( !successful )
782  {
783  TinyShaders_PrintErrorMessage( TINYSHADERS_ERROR_FAILED_SHADER_PROGRAM_LINK, name );
784  printf( "%s\n", errorLog );
785  return GL_FALSE;
786  }
787  //if a shader successfully compiles then it will add itself to storage
788  compiled = GL_TRUE;
789  GetInstance()->shaderPrograms.push_back( this );
790  iD = GetInstance()->shaderPrograms.size() - 1;
791  return GL_TRUE;
792  }
793  TinyShaders_PrintErrorMessage( TINYSHADERS_ERROR_SHADER_PROGRAM_ALREADY_EXISTS, name );
794  return GL_FALSE;
795  }

void tinyShaders::shaderProgram_t::Shutdown ( void  )
inline
735  {
736  glDeleteProgram( handle );
737 
738  for ( GLuint iterator = 0; iterator < GetInstance()->shaders.size(); iterator++ )
739  {
740  GetInstance()->shaders[iterator]->Shutdown();
741  }
742  shaders.clear();
743  inputs.clear();
744  outputs.clear();
745  }

Field Documentation

GLboolean tinyShaders::shaderProgram_t::compiled

Whether the shader program has been linked successfully

GLuint tinyShaders::shaderProgram_t::handle

The OpenGL handle to the shader program

GLuint tinyShaders::shaderProgram_t::iD

The ID of the shader program

std::vector< const GLchar* > tinyShaders::shaderProgram_t::inputs

The inputs of the shader program as a vector of strings

const GLuint tinyShaders::shaderProgram_t::maxNumShaders = 5
static

The Maximum number of components a shader program can have. It's always 5

const GLchar* tinyShaders::shaderProgram_t::name

The name of the shader program

std::vector< const GLchar* > tinyShaders::shaderProgram_t::outputs

The outputs of the shader program as a vector of strings

std::vector< shader_t* > tinyShaders::shaderProgram_t::shaders

The components that the shader program is comprised of as a vector
